alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sampson and southeastern Cumberland Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ammon, or 14 miles southwest of Clinton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail and localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Roseboro, Garland, Salemburg and Bushy Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
